message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a great price of $140. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I see you're serious about the product. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit lower on my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $128?
